description: A short hiking trail near Mount robson Provincial Park to a well know waterfall.  the trail is through some conifgers and well established with crushed stone.  It descends on the way to the fall with elevation loff of about 50m.  The falls are wide but not very high....in late summer you can sometimes spot some mgrating salmon jumping out!
directions: Yellowhead highway (16) towards Jasper.  Rearguard Falls provincial park is on the south side of the highway
title: Rearguard Falls Trail
